dialogue.speaker: AI
dialogue.en: Hello. How can I help you?

dialogue.speaker: USER
dialogue.hint_en: Hi. There seems to be a problem with my reservation.
dialogue.hint_zh: 你好，我的訂房好像有問題。

dialogue.speaker: AI
dialogue.en: I'm sorry to hear that. What's your name?

dialogue.speaker: AI
dialogue.en: I can't find it in the system.
dialogue.zh: 系統裡找不到您的訂房。

dialogue.speaker: AI
dialogue.en: Sure. Do you have a confirmation email?

dialogue.speaker: AI
dialogue.en: Thank you. I found it now.

dialogue.speaker: USER
dialogue.hint_en: Great. Thank you for your help.

coach_feedback.good: 很棒！你能清楚描述問題。
coach_feedback.ok: 不錯！再提出你想要的解法。
coach_feedback.try_again: 先說問題，再問能否幫你確認。
